Front Desk Chatbot for Health Clubs

Connect your club's existing phone number to the most reliable front desk rep you've ever had.

How it Works

Customers text your gym.
Our chatbot automatically responds.

Use Your Existing Number

LegDay enables your club's number to send and receive SMS texts.

Easy Integration

We plug into the most popular member management systems.

Drive Engagement

Communicate with your members through a branded web console.

Create Awareness

Members can find and book classes, and sign up for personalized alerts.

Free Up Time

Automate the most common questions so you can do more.

Accelerate Revenue

Get new and existing customers in the door and spending more.
